sense.def:
Stanje ali položaj, ki je
artificial
ni naravno; obstaja zato, ker ga je ustvaril človek.

seg.quote: These results appear only in very artificial conditions.
The government keeps prices artificially high.
There was a strong element of artificiality in this movement.

sense.def:
Predmeti ali snovi, ki so
artificial
ne nastanejo naravno, temveč jih izdela človek.

Roka ali noga, ki je
artificial
je izdelana iz kovine ali plastike in prilagojena telesu človeka, ki so mu ta ud odrezali.

Človek, čigar vedênje je
artificial
hlini razpoloženje in čustva, ki jih v resnici nima.

seg.quote: They jumped at the suggestion with artificial enthusiasm.
